title: Traditional Stollen
ingredients: ['25g dried active baking yeast', '100ml lukewarm milk', '1 pinch caster sugar', '275ml milk', '250g butter', '1kg plain flour', '200g caster sugar', '250g blanched almonds, coarsely chopped', '2 egg yolks', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon almond extract', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 good pinch ground cloves', '200g mixed peel', '200g sultanas', 'To finish', '2 tablespoons melted butter', 'icing sugar for dusting']
